title: Interview with Tony Greer, Part 2: The Tesla Puzzle, Crypto, the Dollar, and America's Bright Future - Ep 42
itunes:title: Interview with Tony Greer, Part 2: The Tesla Puzzle, Crypto, the Dollar, and America's Bright Future - Ep 42
description:
Part 2. Vitaliy and Tony Greer of TG Macro continue their conversation for Real Vision. In this episode, Vitaliy discusses the investment puzzle presented by Tesla, whether or not he owns the stock, the automotive industry, America's bright future, and more.

You can also listen to complete interview here: https://www.realvision.com/market-risk-and-the-all-terrain-portfolio

Disclosure: Read this before you buy your next stock
